title: Random and constant fps drop
body:
Been getting major fps drop in game. Started after a patch. About 2-3 patches ago but now worst than ever with this latest patch. It's definitely a league thing. My gpu load is at 20-35% in league , starting the game at around 260fps, then 160 in lane then drops of 30-50fps and going up and down causing me to miss cs. I tested out temp and CPU load, recOmmendation from other forums. Tried overwatch and my gpu is maxed out at 90+%. 

I7 4770
Win8.1
Gtx1070
16gb ram.
750 watt

I have had this problem before but I forgot how inresolved it.

replies.body:
There are a number of factors that could be at play and causing this problem. As a quick check, I'd like you to work through our [FPS guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting) to ensure this isn't caused by a common culprit that can be easily resolved.

Let me know if this helped.
